title: God's Creatures, Heartland Film Festival and Indy Bard Fest

author: viewerswfyi@wfyi.org (WFYI Public Media)

description: Matthew Socey reviews the Emily Watson film God's Creatures, previews this year's Heartland Film Festival and Indy Bard Fest (Full disclosure: Matthew is one of the actors in one of the plays)
